scripts.envvars: cat application/src/main/resources/application.yml  | grep '${' | awk -F ':' '{print $2}' | awk -F '{' '{print $2}' |  grep '^[[:upper:]]' | sort -u > ENV_VARS.txt
scripts.i18n: find ./schemas -name '*.json' | xargs -i cat {} | grep -e "title" -e "description" | grep "\." | tr -d \" | tr -d \, | awk -F ':' '{print $2}' | awk '{$1=$1};1' | sort -u > I18N_KEYS.txt
scripts.generate-schemas: mvn spring-boot:run -pl application -Dspring-boot.run.profiles=generate-schemas && rm -rf schemas/specs && mv application/specs schemas/
scripts.generate-envs: mvn spring-boot:run -pl application -Dspring-boot.run.profiles=generate-envs && rm -f ENV_VARS.txt && mv application/ENV_VARS.txt ENV_VARS.txt
